author: Ted Byrne
content:
At the risk of insulting you.... this is my kind of graphic! It's all about color and line. The colors are almost comic book saturated. And the palate is zany. You are not often this ... this... whimsical. It is controlled yet wild. Again, you are not often wild. It is an explosion of saturation. So damned vivid it sears. Thanks a lot Andreas... it's wonderful.

Ted
http://imagefiction.blogspot.com
http://homepage.mac.com/byrneprintmaker/
